mn3:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn3:4.3: ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā’ti.
mn3:4.4: Tumhe ca me, bhikkhave, āmisadāyādā bhaveyyātha no dhammadāyādā, tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyātha:
mn3:4.8: Tumhe ca me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhaveyyātha, no āmisadāyādā, tumhepi tena na ādiyā bhaveyyātha:
mn3:4.12: Tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā.
mn3:4.14: ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā’ti.
mn3:5.1: Idhāhaṃ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṃ pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:5.2: siyā ca me piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:5.5: ‘ahaṃ khomhi, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:5.6: atthi ca me ayaṃ piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:5.7: Sace ākaṅkhatha, bhuñjatha, no ce tumhe bhuñjissatha, idānāhaṃ appaharite vā chaḍḍessāmi, appāṇake vā udake opilāpessāmī’ti.
mn3:6.2: ‘bhagavā kho bhuttāvī pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:6.3: atthi cāyaṃ bhagavato piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:6.4: Sace mayaṃ na bhuñjissāma, idāni bhagavā appaharite vā chaḍḍessati, appāṇake vā udake opilāpessati.
mn3:6.8: Yannūnāhaṃ imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhuñjitvā imināva jighacchādubbalyena evaṃ imaṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyyan’ti.
mn3:6.9: So taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ abhuñjitvā teneva jighacchādubbalyena evaṃ taṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyya.
mn3:7.2: ‘bhagavā kho bhuttāvī pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:7.3: atthi cāyaṃ bhagavato piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:7.4: Sace mayaṃ na bhuñjissāma, idāni bhagavā appaharite vā chaḍḍessati, appāṇake vā udake opilāpessati.
mn3:7.5: Yannūnāhaṃ imaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā jighacchādubbalyaṃ paṭivinodetvā evaṃ imaṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyyan’ti.
mn3:7.6: So taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā jighacchādubbalyaṃ paṭivinodetvā evaṃ taṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyya.
mn3:8.1: Kiñcāpi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu taṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā jighacchādubbalyaṃ paṭivinodetvā evaṃ taṃ rattindivaṃ vītināmeyya, atha kho asuyeva me purimo bhikkhu pujjataro ca pāsaṃsataro ca.
mn3:8.3: Tañhi tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dīgharattaṃ appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā sallekhāya subharatāya vīriyārambhāya saṃvattissati.
mn3:8.4: Tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā.
mn3:8.6: ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṃ, no āmisadāyādā’”ti.
mn3:9.2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
mn3:10.1: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn3:10.3: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
mn3:11.1: “Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti, kittāvatā ca pana satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhantī”ti?
mn3:11.2: “Dūratopi kho mayaṃ, āvuso, āgacchāma āyasmato sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa atthamaññātuṃ.
mn3:11.3: Sādhu vatāyasmantaṃyeva sāriputtaṃ paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho;
mn3:11.5: “Tena hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn3:11.6: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
mn3:12.1: “Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti?
mn3:12.2: Idhāvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti, yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha, te ca dhamme nappajahanti, bāhulikā ca honti, sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā.
mn3:12.3: Tatrāvuso, therā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:12.5: iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:12.6: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme nappajahantī’ti—
mn3:12.7: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:12.8: ‘Bāhulikā ca, sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā’ti—
mn3:12.9: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:12.10: Therā, āvuso, bhikkhū imehi tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:12.13: navā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:12.15: iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:12.16: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme nappajahantī’ti—
mn3:12.17: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:12.18: ‘Bāhulikā ca honti, sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā’ti—
mn3:12.19: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:12.20: Navā, āvuso, bhikkhū imehi tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:12.21: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṃ nānusikkhanti.
mn3:13.1: Kittāvatā ca panāvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhanti?
mn3:13.2: Idhāvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhanti—
mn3:13.3: yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme pajahanti;
mn3:13.4: na ca bāhulikā honti, na sāthalikā okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā.
mn3:13.5: Tatrāvuso, therā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:13.7: iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:13.8: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme pajahantī’ti—
mn3:13.9: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:13.10: ‘Na ca bāhulikā, na sāthalikā okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā’ti—
mn3:13.11: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:13.12: Therā, āvuso, bhikkhū imehi tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:13.15: navā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:13.17: iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:13.18: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṃ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme pajahantī’ti—
mn3:13.19: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:13.20: ‘Na ca bāhulikā, na sāthalikā okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā’ti—
mn3:13.21: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:13.22: Navā, āvuso, bhikkhū imehi tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṃsā bhavanti.
mn3:13.23: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhanti.
mn3:14.1: Tatrāvuso, lobho ca pāpako doso ca pāpako.
mn3:14.2: Lobhassa ca pahānāya dosassa ca pahānāya atthi majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn3:14.3: Katamā ca sā, āvuso, majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
mn3:14.5: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
mn3:14.6: Ayaṃ kho sā, āvuso, majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn3:15.1: Tatrāvuso, kodho ca pāpako upanāho ca pāpako …
mn3:15.3: makkho ca pāpako paḷāso ca pāpako, issā ca pāpikā maccherañca pāpakaṃ, māyā ca pāpikā sāṭheyyañca pāpakaṃ, thambho ca pāpako sārambho ca pāpako, māno ca pāpako atimāno ca pāpako, mado ca pāpako pamādo ca pāpako.
mn3:15.4: Madassa ca pahānāya pamādassa ca pahānāya atthi majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
mn3:15.5: Katamā ca sā, āvuso, majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati?
mn3:15.7: sammādiṭṭhi sammāsaṅkappo sammāvācā sammākammanto sammāājīvo sammāvāyāmo sammāsati sammāsamādhi.
mn3:15.8: Ayaṃ kho sā, āvuso, majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattatī”ti.
mn3:16.2: Attamanā te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
